divs: sighting detailsit was late wednesday night\early thursday mourning. i would estimate the time around 3:30. i was taking my new puppy, out to go potty, when sighting occurred. it took me roughly a minute or so before my dog barked, because she sighted the object. in the back woods, of a state park, behind my house, is where the object was sighted. it appeared to be square in shape, and was hovering above the treeline. i noticed lights on the object, looked to have 3 red lights, and 1 white light. as i watched it, it was traveling southward, and then seemed to almost just vanish. i could semi-clearly make out the object at first and within a minute it almost faded away. it never seemed to land, and was definitely making distinct fast movements, when not hovering. i personally do not follow or have a believe in ufo's, but i can not explain what i saw, and as i was watching, i had a certain fear that it would come towards me. i am unaware of what the object was, but it has "shaken" me up, and made me re-think everything i believed in.....
Summary: UFO in a square shape, hovered then disappered.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Potterville
This sighting has never been favorited.
